thread.section_title: Isco plays down Barcelona transfer link – Metro
thread.title: Isco plays down Barcelona transfer link
thread.title_full: Isco plays down Barcelona transfer link

author: Chris Davie
title: Isco plays down Barcelona transfer link
text:
Isco has been heavily linked with a move to Barcelona. (Getty Images) Isco has distanced himself from reports linking him with a move from Real Madrid to Barcelona.
The 24-year-old will have just one year left on his current contract at the end of the season and has already admitted that he is concerned with his lack of playing time under Zinedine Zidane .
Isco has reportedly been offered £17.2 million by Barcelona to run down the final year of his deal with Madrid , but the midfielder insists there is no truth to what’s been said.
Isco scored Spain’s fourth in Friday’s win over Israel. (Getty Images) More: Football Chelsea ready to secure major star's future with new contract 
Liverpool star wants to join Barcelona as transfer talks begin 
Arsenal send class message to Seamus Coleman after Everton defender suffers broken leg 
‘As players we’re susceptible to rumours,’ said the midfielder.
‘We’re used to it and now that there’s less football with the international break, some sections of the media have to make things up.’
MORE: Philippe Coutinho wants Barcelona move as talks open to sign Liverpool star 
MORE: Arsenal send class message to Seamus Coleman after Everton defender suffers broken leg
